returns._0: The id of the latest release.
The upgrade by time for the latest release.

params.releaseId: The id of the release to get.

returns._0: The release at the specified index.

params.releaseId: The id of the release to check.

returns._0: True if the release is the latest release, false otherwise.

params.operatorSet: The operator set this release is for.

returns.releaseId: The index of the newly published release.

getLatestRelease((address,uint32)).notice: Returns the latest release for an operator set.

getLatestUpgradeByTime((address,uint32)).notice: Returns the upgrade by time for the latest release.

getRelease((address,uint32),uint256).notice: Returns a specific release by index.

getTotalReleases((address,uint32)).notice: Returns the total number of releases for an operator set.

isValidRelease((address,uint32),uint256).notice: Returns true if the release is the latest release, false otherwise.

publishRelease((address,uint32),((bytes3.notice: Publishes a new release for an operator set.
